title: Why does YouTube remove views? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can only think of two possible reasons why YouTube may remove views. Here are those reasons: The views came from bots or are fake. YouTube is constantly verifying if the views are real people or bots.Your videos has a lot of duplicate views, meaning that users are replaying or watching your video more than once. I believe that YouTube will delete duplicate views. Why? This is because there was a music video that replayed constantly and a few months later, I went back to the video and YouTube claims that I have never watched it, but I never deleted watch history. You will know if you watched the video fully by checking if their is a red bar on the bottom of the video thumbnail.
